mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board( board_title, board_content, board_writer, board_hit, idx ) VALUES ( #{btitle}, #{bcontent}, #{bwriter}, 0, #{idx} )
mapper.select: SELECT board_no as bno, board_title as btitle, board_writer as bwriter, board_hit as bhit, board_updatetime as bupdatetime, idx as idx FROM board ORDER BY board_no DESC LIMIT #{skip}, #{amount}

SELECT board_no as bno, board_title as btitle, board_writer as bwriter, board_content as bcontent, board_hit as bhit, board_datetime as bdatetime, board_updatetime as bupdatetime FROM board WHERE board_no = #{bno}
